tags.todo: Implement Cache for session requests' results?

__construct.name: __construct

get_salt.name: get_salt
get_salt.summary: Returns the salt string kept in session.

check_salt.name: check_salt
check_salt.summary: Confronts the given string with the salt string kept in session.

get_cfg.name: get_cfg

get_class_cfg.name: get_class_cfg
get_class_cfg.summary: Returns the current configuration of this very class.

get_path.name: get_path
get_path.summary: Returns the directory path for the user.

get_tmp_dir.name: get_tmp_dir
get_tmp_dir.summary: Returns the tmp directory path for the user.

get_tables.name: get_tables
get_tables.summary: Returns the list of tables used by the current class.

get_fields.name: get_fields
get_fields.summary: Returns the list of fields of the given table, and if empty for each table.

update_info.name: update_info
update_info.summary: Changes the data in the user's table.

get_password.name: get_password
get_password.summary: Encrypts the given string to match the password.

is_just_login.name: is_just_login
is_just_login.summary: Returns true after the log in moment.

set_session.name: set_session
set_session.summary: Sets the given attribute(s) in the user's session.

unset_session.name: unset_session
unset_session.summary: Sets the given attribute(s) in the user's session.

get_session.name: get_session
get_session.summary: Returns session property from the session's user array.

has_session.name: has_session
has_session.summary: Checks if the given attribute exists in the user's session.

update_activity.name: update_activity

save_session.name: save_session
save_session.summary: Saves the session config in the database.

close_session.name: close_session
close_session.summary: Closes the session in the database.

check_attempts.name: check_attempts
check_attempts.summary: Returns false if the max number of connections attempts has been reached

save_cfg.name: save_cfg
save_cfg.summary: Saves the user's config in the cfg field of the users' table.

set_cfg.name: set_cfg
set_cfg.summary: Saves the attribute(s) values into the session config.

unset_cfg.name: unset_cfg
unset_cfg.summary: Unsets the attribute(s) in the session config.

is_auth.name: is_auth
is_auth.summary: Returns true if authenticated false otherwise.

check_session.name: check_session
check_session.summary: Retrieves user's info from session if needed and checks if authenticated.

get_id.name: get_id
get_id.summary: Returns the user's ID if there is no error.

get_group.name: get_group
get_group.summary: Returns the user's group's ID if there is no error.

expire_hotlink.name: expire_hotlink
expire_hotlink.summary: Expires an hotlink by setting the expire column to now.

get_id_from_magic_string.name: get_id_from_magic_string
get_id_from_magic_string.summary: Retrieves a user's ID from the hotlink's magic string.

is_admin.name: is_admin
is_admin.summary: Checks whether the user is an admin or not.

is_dev.name: is_dev
is_dev.summary: Checks whether the user is an dev(eloper) or not.

check.name: check
check.summary: Checks if an error has been thrown or not.

parent.name: check
parent.summary: Checks whether the error property has been set (so an error happened).

logout.name: logout
logout.summary: Unauthenticates, resets the config and destroys the session.

get_mailer.name: get_mailer
get_mailer.summary: Returns an instance of the mailer class.

set_password.name: set_password
set_password.summary: Change the password in the database after checking the current one.

force_password.name: force_password
force_password.summary: Changes the password in the database.

get_name.name: get_name
get_name.summary: Returns the full name of the given user or the current one.

add_token.name: add_token

get_email.name: get_email
get_email.summary: Returns the email of the given user or the current one.

add_to_tmp.name: add_to_tmp
add_to_tmp.summary: Adds a file to the tmp folder of the user and returns its path.

crypt.name: crypt

decrypt.name: decrypt

get_user.name: get_user
get_user.summary: Returns the latest created connection, ie the current user's object.

make_fingerprint.name: make_fingerprint
make_fingerprint.summary: Generates a random long string (16-32 chars) used as unique fingerprint.

make_magic_string.name: make_magic_string
make_magic_string.summary: Returns an array with a key and a magic string used for making hotlinks.

is_magic_string.name: is_magic_string
is_magic_string.summary: Checks if a given string corresponds to the given hash.

get_error.name: get_error
get_error.summary: Returns the first error in an array with the code and description.

test.name: test
test.summary: Checks whether the error property has been set (so an error happened).

parent.name: test
parent.summary: Checks whether the error property has been set (so an error happened).

__call.name: __call

parent.name: __call

get_instance.name: get_instance
get_instance.summary: Returns the instance of the singleton or null.

retriever_exists.name: retriever_exists
retriever_exists.summary: Returns true if an instance as been initiated.

errors.8: less than 5 mn between emailing password
errors.16: impossible to add session in the database
